messages.messageBody:
On Jul 19, 2008, at 12:17 AM, Margaret wrote:

> err... all ages of unschooling kids, right? Not the otaku parents of
> unschooling children :)

Well, no, it's a list for unschoolers so all ages means all ages :-)
Interest is the key not kid status.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
err... all ages of unschooling kids, right? Not the otaku parents of
unschooling children :)

Margaret
(the only otaku in the house as the kids are too young to read)

On Thu, Jul 17, 2008 at 9:20 AM, Joyce Fetteroll <jfetteroll@...> wrote:
> I started a list for unschoolers who like manga and anime. All ages
> welcome. :-)
>
> I know there are unschooling conferences coming up and I thought it
> would be a great way for kids to meet before the conference and maybe
> have some already in place friends before they get there :-)
>
> Otaku Unschoolers
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/otaku_unschoolers/
>
> Either go to the website and sign up there or send a blank email to:
>
> otaku_unschoolers-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
> Feel free to pass the link along to other unschooling groups (or
> groups sympathetic to unschoolers) :-)
>
> Joyce
>

messages.subject: Manga and anime list for unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I started a list for unschoolers who like manga and anime. All ages welcome. :-) I know there are unschooling conferences coming up and I thought it would be a
messages.messageBody:
I started a list for unschoolers who like manga and anime. All ages
welcome. :-)

I know there are unschooling conferences coming up and I thought it
would be a great way for kids to meet before the conference and maybe
have some already in place friends before they get there :-)

Otaku Unschoolers
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/otaku_unschoolers/

Either go to the website and sign up there or send a blank email to:

otaku_unschoolers-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

Feel free to pass the link along to other unschooling groups (or
groups sympathetic to unschoolers) :-)

Joyce
